title: Heartbeat
description: She is instantly attracted to the very hot and brilliant doctor.Young, fresh out of medical school, Alex Bessler is primed on focusing on her residency. She isn't prepared for the distraction that comes in the form of a toned body with a pair of long powerful legs in scrubs, and the sexiest eyes behind a surgical mask.He tells her outright he has no time for relationships, that he can't give her more than just a casual hookup. But how can she give any less when she knows she's already falling hard for him?With conflicting emotions, she realizes she's willing to risk a heartache for precious moments with him. Memories she can look back on when she finally leaves. But will that be enough?
author: Siena Colmer
